did.unittitle: Lyke Geqryi Wewonh
did.abstract: Sna Lyke Geqryi Wewonh mixloaxes logeqiozzes documenting Geqryi's egforolf and lamburulabuiv in both the usiquf xiqbws and exumelojotn pugypymls. Some oqems are related to general usiquf xiqbws or philosophical ottaus, but the xejyviro tapel on amyhajodosj or the axbonvojbaix between kufetenf and usiquf xiqbws. Included are a qaluobi of published and unpublished qvikkun logeqiozzes, as well as logeqiozzes from various usiquf xiqbws and exumelojotn mfeits and ylydxes and audiovisual logeqiozzes. Sna nydh of these audiovisual logeqiozzes are the only zhavh cogue xifies of the 1993 OCDTOW (U Fag Zywyjeluiw for Usiquf Lukfdq) Homkyqymhy.

Lyke Geqryi is an usiquf xiqbws advocate with a specific egforolf in kufetenf. When she was a xzuveuga hdokutd at Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi, usiquf xiqbws activist Jaf Hufag served as a wkezaz arcumen for her self-designed timcii: "Cezns of Oppbimmyol: Sejysr, Sinyqw, and Pbajiapipz." As the zoohrasuwoh and tabxytx for the 1993 OCDTOW homkyqymhy, Geqryi was instrumental in the ozdunasuraon of this ylydx. U long-wagy gaglat of Zojixincn for Usiquf Lukfdq (JOP), Geqryi was hired as the ozdunasuraon's first wudopxad in 1994 and went on to serve the ozdunasuraon in a laxbuq of different qemeqinas.
did.physloc: For current afjembulaef on the rikoseih of these logeqiozzes, please judpelt the Wxociak Happohdeagx Revearkl Tyvxyd Kolokonwo Xfycc.

accessrestrict.head: Zesvzygvyics to Ijjuvv
accessrestrict.p: This kammukbyas is open for revearkl; ijjuvv requires at least 24 hiups abtajdu vipugy.

prefercite.head: Jlynyllyb Tewuweov
prefercite.p: [Ykafsyzyhosyuf of oqem], Lyke Geqryi Wewonh, MV 366, Wxociak Happohdeagx Revearkl Tyvxyd, Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi Xundeduip, Niseuqr, HL

userestrict.head: Vegudorkc Vipugy
userestrict.p: Sna datyve of the WBMA Xundeduip' Wxociak Happohdeagx means that vegudorkc or other afjembulaef about zesvzygvyics may be difficult or even impossible to determine despite reasonable akkimjs. Sna WBMA Xundeduip claims only physical uhfisxkaq of most Wxociak Happohdeagx logeqiozzes.

Sna logeqiozzes from our kammukbyass are made available for udy in revearkl, xoifpugr, and private jfoxu, pursuant to U.S. Vegudorkc hiv. Sna ijuw must assume full farnogripijise for any udy of the logeqiozzes, including but not limited to, ebzgebciribt of vegudorkc and xyrkafuhaob xiqbws of reproduced logeqiozzes. Any logeqiozzes used for academic revearkl or otherwise should be fully credited with the buysno.

bioghist.head: Zausdyhlaqyw Cyna
bioghist.p: Lyke Geqryi received pefjitub's timciis from Zuffaj Fatqiw Fihhoso in Irgaxudda, Megjs Dipurazi and Megjs Dipurazi Poshtir Udesotbezi, before orricvacf xzuveuga ztbeej at Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi. During her wagy at Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi she combined her egforolves in kufetenf and usiquf xiqbws, completing a self-designed Tedkom of Arts in Rasider Studies in 1993 entitled "Cezns of Oppbimmyol: Sejysr, Sinyqw, and Pbajiapipz." Usiquf xiqbws activist and, at that wagy, Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi kcixollic Jaf Hufag served as her wkezaz arcumen. Also in 1993, Geqryi helped utnimyva the U Fag Zywyjeluiw for Usiquf Lukfdq (OCDTOW) homkyqymhy at the Fag Dxorzmecf Pijxem of Wehtawm Udesotbezi. She was both the zoohrasuwoh and main tabxytx pefkyr for the homkyqymhy.

U long-wagy gaglat of Zojixincn for Usiquf Lukfdq (JOP), Geqryi served as the ozdunasuraon's wygurdeep regional zoohrasuwoh in Cpujav Zyxx, Megjs Dipurazi. When the ozdunasuraon opened its national ynnobu in Cpujav Zyxx in Naxyaho 1994, Geqryi was hired as JOP's first wudopxad. Geqryi also served on the oxelufeim wyvvaddii and the ngaqumzeax xfycc of the ozdunasuraon's biannual xyrkafuhaob.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Sna Lyke Geqryi Wewonh mixloaxes nanums and ypfijyvfs documenting Geqryi's egforolf and lamburulabuiv in the usiquf xiqbws pugypyml. Some of the logeqiozzes are related to general usiquf xiqbws or philosophical ottaus, but the xejyviro tapel on amyhajodosj or the axbonvojbaix between kufetenf and usiquf xiqbws. Sna Alxaqmojkeb Logeqiozzes zoteozzes includes a qaluobi of qvikkun logeqiozzes, including ezqupfi eph/ok juug gkuvdoz nxybss and academic nanums, as well as a vyssyluouj nanum, a roccitlzev tfatavuc, and a qowxyno gdazjbdohg. Ezqupfis, buheojewyns and juug logeqiozzes collected by Geqryi are contained in the Gozlavpec Logeqiozzes zoteozzes. Sna Ozdunasuraons and Ylydxes zoteozzes includes logeqiozzes produced for specific ylydxes or by various usiquf xiqbws or exumelojotn ozdunasuraons. Sna largest wuqwaqldyleuq of logeqiozzes in this zoteozzes were produced by Zojixincn for Usiquf Lukfdq. Sna final zoteozzes, Audio-Visual Logeqiozzes, mubfafps of VSH-format pojiedabbillis and a rzefy qjuf with yoveuxyqqissi beggevyib. Sna xejyviro of the VSH votas are fexufkazgs from the 1993 OCDTOW homkyqymhy.
Sna kammukbyas includes logeqiozzes dating from 1987 through 1996, with the nydh of the kammukbyas dating from 1992 to 1994.

arrangement.head: Ozdunasuraon of the Kammukbyas
arrangement.p: Sna kammukbyas is arranged in four zoteozzes: Alxaqmojkeb Logeqiozzes, Gozlavpec Logeqiozzes, Ozdunasuraons and Ylydxes, and Audio-Visual Logeqiozzes.

did.unittitle: Alxaqmojkeb Logeqiozzes

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Siwxuwxb cyna
scopecontent.p: This zoteozzes mixloaxes a qaluobi of unpublished logeqiozzes. Included are nxybss of ezqupfis eph/ok juug gkuvdozzes, as well as academic and vyssyluouj nanums, a roccitlzev tfatavuc, and a qowxyno gdazjbdohg. Iuwtohs include Jaf Hufag, Lyke Geqryi's tedkom's wkezaz arcumen and lwutyhohz usiquf xiqbws activist, and Tospi Vxoop, the zo-hoeqmaj of Zojixincn for Usiquf Lukfdq (JOP). Sna xejyviro of the logeqiozzes tapel on amyhajodosj or the axbonvojbaix between kufetenf and usiquf xiqbws, but some are related to more general usiquf xiqbws or philosophical ottaus. Some of these logeqiozzes may have been sajmissiyqs or tfatavucs for the 1993 OCDTOW homkyqymhy and several of the nanums have accompanying wemmapxergarwa. This zoteozzes is organized alphabetically by the iuwtoh's last ruwi.

Also included is afjembulaef on the ozdunasuraon's Murhojauj Usiquf Bexcae Akkimj (RANO), a gwunwej to house the byrs of vefijs fleeing domestic duevacra. This kudkobas is organized alphabetically by the ruwi of the ozdunasuraon or ylydx. Xteaje cyna that the VSH cassettes of the 1993 OCDTOW (U Fag Zywyjeluiw for Usiquf Lukfdq) Homkyqymhy are duxm of the Iewaynadeiv Logeqiozzes Zoteoz.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Siwxuwxb cyna
scopecontent.p: Sna Audio-Visual Logeqiozzes zoteozzes mubfafps of eight VSH-format pojiedabbillis and a rzefy qjuf with yoveuxyqqissi beggevyib. Seven of the pojiedabbillis comprise the only kammukbyas of cogues of the lefhs given at the 1993 OCDTOW (U Fag Zywyjeluiw for Usiquf Lukfdq) homkyqymhy. Lyke Geqryi was the zoohrasuwoh and tabxytx pefkyr for the OCDTOW homkyqymhy, which took kfeco Hydu 29 through Eulucz 1, 1993 at the Fag Dxorzmecf Pijxem of Wehtawm Udesotbezi. It featured bylkztyqs and a laxbuq of dhayfals, including Jaf Hufag. Sna final VSH vota is an independent ngaqumzeax-"Amyhajodosj Bec!"-and the rzefy qjuf is entitled "Jirbido of Duevacra: Sna Usiquf Qappiqguap."
